1: וּכְהִתְפַּלֵּ֤ל <sup>6419 </sup> <n>had prayed</n> עֶזְרָא֙ <sup>5830 </sup> <n>Now when Ezra</n> וּכְ֨הִתְוַדֹּת֔וֹ <sup>3034 </sup> <n>and when he had confessed</n> בֹּכֶה֙ <sup>1058 </sup> <n>weeping</n> וּמִתְנַפֵּ֔ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>and casting himself down</n> לִפְנֵ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>the house</n> הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> נִקְבְּצוּ֩ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>there assembled</n> אֵלָ֨יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>unto him out of Israel</n> קָהָ֣ל <sup>6951 </sup> <n>congregation</n> רַב־ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>great</n> מְאֹ֗ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>a very</n> אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <sup>582 </sup> <n>of men</n> וְנָשִׁים֙ <sup>802 </sup> <n>and women</n> וִֽילָדִ֔ים <sup>3206 </sup> <n>and children</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בָכ֥וּ <sup>1058 </sup> <n>wept</n> הָעָ֖ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>for the people</n> הַרְבֵּה־ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>very</n> בֶֽכֶה׃ <sup>1059 </sup> <n>sore</n> ס
2: וַיַּעַן֩ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>answered</n> שְׁכַנְיָ֨ה <sup>7935 </sup> <n>And Shechaniah</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> יְחִיאֵ֜ל <sup>3171 </sup> <n>of Jehiel</n> מִבְּנֵ֤י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>[one] of the sons</n> [עֹולָם כ] (עֵילָם֙ <sup>5867 </sup> <n>Elam</n> ק) וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> לְעֶזְרָ֔א <sup>5830 </sup> <n>unto Ezra</n> אֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <sup>587 </sup> <n>we</n> מָעַ֣לְנוּ <sup>4603 </sup> <n>We have trespassed</n> בֵאלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <sup>430 </sup> <n>against our God</n> וַנֹּ֛שֶׁב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and have taken</n> נָשִׁ֥ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>wives</n> נָכְרִיּ֖וֹת <sup>5237 </sup> <n>strange</n> מֵעַמֵּ֣י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> הָאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the land</n> וְעַתָּ֛ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> יֵשׁ־ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>yet now there is</n> מִקְוֶ֥ה <sup>4723 </sup> <n>hope</n> לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>in Israel</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>spite</n> זֹֽאת׃ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>So</n>
3: וְעַתָּ֣ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> נִֽכְרָת־ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>Now therefore let us make</n> בְּרִ֣ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>a covenant</n> לֵ֠אלֹהֵינוּ <sup>430 </sup> <n>with our God</n> לְהוֹצִ֨יא <sup>3318 </sup> <n>to put away</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> נָשִׁ֜ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>all the wives</n> וְהַנּוֹלָ֤ד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>and such as are born</n> מֵהֶם֙ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>according</n> בַּעֲצַ֣ת <sup>6098 </sup> <n>of them according to the counsel</n> אֲדֹנָ֔י <sup>113 </sup> <n>master</n> וְהַחֲרֵדִ֖ים <sup>2730 </sup> <n>and of those that tremble</n> בְּמִצְוַ֣ת <sup>4687 </sup> <n>at the commandment</n> אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <sup>430 </sup> <n>of our God</n> וְכַתּוֹרָ֖ה <sup>8451 </sup> <n>according to the law</n> יֵעָשֶֽׂה׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and let it be done</n>
4: ק֛וּם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>Arise</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עָלֶ֥יךָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>is your responsibility</n> הַדָּבָ֖ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>for [this] matter</n> וַאֲנַ֣חְנוּ <sup>587 </sup> <n>ourselves</n> עִמָּ֑ךְ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>will be with</n> חֲזַ֖ק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>[belongeth] unto thee we also [will be] with thee be of good courage</n> וַעֲשֵֽׂה׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and do</n> פ
5: וַיָּ֣קָם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>Then arose</n> עֶזְרָ֡א <sup>5830 </sup> <n>Ezra</n> וַיַּשְׁבַּ֣ע <sup>7650 </sup> <n>to swear</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שָׂרֵי֩ <sup>8269 </sup> <n>and made the chief</n> הַכֹּהֲנִ֨ים <sup>3548 </sup> <n>priests</n> הַלְוִיִּ֜ם <sup>3881 </sup> <n>the Levites</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>and all Israel</n> לַעֲשׂ֛וֹת <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that they should do</n> כַּדָּבָ֥ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>according to this word</n> הַזֶּ֖ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>to this</n> וַיִּשָּׁבֵֽעוּ׃ <sup>7650 </sup> <n>And they sware</n>
6: וַיָּ֣קָם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>rose up</n> עֶזְרָ֗א <sup>5830 </sup> <n>Then Ezra</n> מִלִּפְנֵי֙ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>from before</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>the house</n> הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> וַיֵּ֕לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and went</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> לִשְׁכַּ֖ת <sup>3957 </sup> <n>into the chamber</n> יְהוֹחָנָ֣ן <sup>3076 </sup> <n>of Johanan</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> אֶלְיָשִׁ֑יב <sup>475 </sup> <n>of Eliashib</n> וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> שָׁ֗ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> לֶ֤חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>no bread</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> אָכַל֙ <sup>398 </sup> <n>thither he did eat</n> וּמַ֣יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>water</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> שָׁתָ֔ה <sup>8354 </sup> <n>nor drink</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> מִתְאַבֵּ֖ל <sup>56 </sup> <n>for he mourned</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> מַ֥עַל <sup>4604 </sup> <n>because of the transgression</n> הַגּוֹלָֽה׃ <sup>1473 </sup> <n>of them that had been carried away</n> ס
7: וַיַּעֲבִ֨ירוּ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>made</n> ק֜וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>A proclamation</n> בִּיהוּדָ֣ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>throughout Judah</n> וִירֽוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>and Jerusalem</n> לְכֹל֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to all</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>unto all the children</n> הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <sup>1473 </sup> <n>of the captivity</n> לְהִקָּבֵ֖ץ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>that they should gather themselves together</n> יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <sup>3389 </sup> <n>unto Jerusalem</n>
8: וְכֹל֩ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָב֜וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>And that whosoever would not come</n> לִשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <sup>7969 </sup> <n>within three</n> הַיָּמִ֗ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>days</n> כַּעֲצַ֤ת <sup>6098 </sup> <n>according to the counsel</n> הַשָּׂרִים֙ <sup>8269 </sup> <n>of the princes</n> וְהַזְּקֵנִ֔ים <sup>2205 </sup> <n>and the elders</n> יָחֳרַ֖ם <sup>2763 </sup> <n>should be forfeited</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> רְכוּשׁ֑וֹ <sup>7399 </sup> <n>all his substance</n> וְה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>himself</n> יִבָּדֵ֖ל <sup>914 </sup> <n>and himself separated</n> מִקְּהַ֥ל <sup>6951 </sup> <n>from the congregation</n> הַגּוֹלָֽה׃ <sup>1473 </sup> <n>of those that had been carried away</n> ס
9: וַיִּקָּבְצ֣וּ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>gathered themselves together</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אַנְשֵֽׁי־ <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> יְהוּדָה֩ <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> וּבִנְיָמִ֨ן ׀ <sup>1144 </sup> <n>and Benjamin</n> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>unto Jerusalem</n> לִשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <sup>7969 </sup> <n>within three</n> הַיָּמִ֗ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>days</n> ה֛וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> חֹ֥דֶשׁ <sup>2320 </sup> <n>month</n> הַתְּשִׁיעִ֖י <sup>8671 </sup> <n>It [was] the ninth</n> בְּעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <sup>6242 </sup> <n>on the twentieth</n> בַּחֹ֑דֶשׁ <sup>2320 </sup> <n>[day] of the month</n> וַיֵּשְׁב֣וּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>sat</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הָעָ֗ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and all the people</n> בִּרְחוֹב֙ <sup>7339 </sup> <n>in the street</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> מַרְעִידִ֥ים <sup>7460 </sup> <n>trembling</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>because</n> הַדָּבָ֖ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>because of [this] matter</n> וּמֵהַגְּשָׁמִֽים׃ <sup>1653 </sup> <n>and for the great rain</n> פ
10: וַיָּ֨קָם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>stood up</n> עֶזְרָ֤א <sup>5830 </sup> <n>And Ezra</n> הַכֹּהֵן֙ <sup>3548 </sup> <n>the priest</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אַתֶּ֣ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>You</n> מְעַלְתֶּ֔ם <sup>4603 </sup> <n>unto them Ye have transgressed</n> וַתֹּשִׁ֖יבוּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and have taken</n> נָשִׁ֣ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>wives</n> נָכְרִיּ֑וֹת <sup>5237 </sup> <n>strange</n> לְהוֹסִ֖יף <sup>3254 </sup> <n>to increase</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>unto</n> אַשְׁמַ֥ת <sup>819 </sup> <n>the trespass</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
11: וְעַתָּ֗ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> תְּנ֥וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Now therefore make</n> תוֹדָ֛ה <sup>8426 </sup> <n>confession</n> לַיהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>of your fathers</n> וַעֲשׂ֣וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and do</n> רְצוֹנ֑וֹ <sup>7522 </sup> <n>his pleasure</n> וְהִבָּֽדְלוּ֙ <sup>914 </sup> <n>and separate</n> מֵעַמֵּ֣י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>yourselves from the people</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the land</n> וּמִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> הַנָּשִׁ֖ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>wives</n> הַנָּכְרִיּֽוֹת׃ <sup>5237 </sup> <n>and from the strange</n>
12: וַיַּֽעְנ֧וּ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>answered</n> כָֽל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַקָּהָ֛ל <sup>6951 </sup> <n>Then all the congregation</n> וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> ק֣וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>voice</n> גָּד֑וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>with a loud</n> כֵּ֛ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> [כְּדִבְרֶיךָ כ] (כִּדְבָרְךָ֥ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>act</n> ק) עָלֵ֖ינוּ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>is our duty</n> לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>so must we do</n>
13: אֲבָ֞ל <sup>61 </sup> <n>But</n> הָעָ֥ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> רָב֙ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>[are] many</n> וְהָעֵ֣ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>and [it is] a time</n> גְּשָׁמִ֔ים <sup>1653 </sup> <n>of much rain</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>are not</n> כֹּ֖חַ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>and we are not able</n> לַעֲמ֣וֹד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>to stand</n> בַּח֑וּץ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>without</n> וְהַמְּלָאכָ֗ה <sup>4399 </sup> <n>neither [is this] a work</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> לְי֤וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>day</n> אֶחָד֙ <sup>259 </sup> <n>of one</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> לִשְׁנַ֔יִם <sup>8147 </sup> <n>or two</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הִרְבִּ֥ינוּ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>for we are many</n> לִפְשֹׁ֖עַ <sup>6586 </sup> <n>that have transgressed</n> בַּדָּבָ֥ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>in this thing</n> הַזֶּֽה׃ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n>
14: יַֽעֲמְדוּ־ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>stand</n> נָ֣א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Let</n> שָׂ֠רֵינוּ <sup>8269 </sup> <n>Let now our rulers</n> לְֽכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>the whole</n> הַקָּהָ֞ל <sup>6951 </sup> <n>of all the congregation</n> וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>those</n> בֶּעָרֵ֗ינוּ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>in our cities</n> הַהֹשִׁ֞יב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and let all them which have taken</n> נָשִׁ֤ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>wives</n> נָכְרִיּוֹת֙ <sup>5237 </sup> <n>strange</n> יָבֹא֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n> לְעִתִּ֣ים <sup>6256 </sup> <n>times</n> מְזֻמָּנִ֔ים <sup>2163 </sup> <n>at appointed</n> וְעִמָּהֶ֛ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>together</n> זִקְנֵי־ <sup>2205 </sup> <n>and with them the elders</n> עִ֥יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of every city</n> וָעִ֖יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>city</n> וְשֹׁפְטֶ֑יהָ <sup>8199 </sup> <n>and the judges</n> עַ֠ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> לְהָשִׁ֞יב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>be turned</n> חֲר֤וֹן <sup>2740 </sup> <n>thereof until the fierce</n> אַף־ <sup>639 </sup> <n>wrath</n> אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>of our God</n> מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> עַ֖ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>account</n> לַדָּבָ֥ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>for this matter</n> הַזֶּֽה׃ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>of this</n> פ
15: אַ֣ךְ <sup>389 </sup> <n>Only</n> יוֹנָתָ֧ן <sup>3129 </sup> <n>Only Jonathan</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> עֲשָׂהאֵ֛ל <sup>6214 </sup> <n>of Asahel</n> וְיַחְזְיָ֥ה <sup>3167 </sup> <n>and Jahaziah</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> תִּקְוָ֖ה <sup>8616 </sup> <n>of Tikvah</n> עָמְד֣וּ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>were employed</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> זֹ֑את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>with</n> וּמְשֻׁלָּ֛ם <sup>4918 </sup> <n>about this [matter] and Meshullam</n> וְשַׁבְּתַ֥י <sup>7678 </sup> <n>and Shabbethai</n> הַלֵּוִ֖י <sup>3881 </sup> <n>the Levite</n> עֲזָרֻֽם׃ <sup>5826 </sup> <n>helped</n>
